system.description: Waves of energy roll forth from you in a direction you choose, causing all wooden objects in a 60-ft. line to be pushed away at 40 feet per round. Wooden objects larger than 3 inches in diameter that are fixed firmly are not affected; loose objects are. Fixed objects 3 inches or smaller splinter and break. Wooden shields, spears, weapon hafts, arrows, and bolts are pushed back, dragging carriers. Magic items with wooden sections are repelled; antimagic field blocks the effect. The path is set when you cast the spell.
